title: MFW someone says we have no tank
body:
When we have a Leona support.

http://66.media.tumblr.com/393447762ce23d45a7514396369b1571/tumblr_mzqrrtgpmr1t6ny0ro1_1280.jpg

Really? Really?

replies.body:
Leona i find is one of the tankiest tanks (probably cause Eclipse). I've stood several seconds in the middle on the enemy team and not die. Its hilarious... on another note:

Mcree: It's high noon

Mercy: Mcree, its 11:42.

Mcree: Oh. *Goes back inside.*

Mcree (11:56): ITS HIGH NOON!

Mercy: Still four minutes

Mcree: oh... *goes to the bathroom*

Mcree: ITS HIGH NOON!!!

Mercy: 12:02

Mcree: GOD DAMN IT.

IIRC a rioter once said that {{champion:89}}  was balanced around her not having much gold.  Which is probably why full build leonas  take decades to kill.

Gets Annie ARAM. Starts to hear complaints about us not having a tank and them having one.

{{champion:1}}: {{item:3027}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3047}} {{item:1057}} 'e' 

Time to catch a pedo. Cause this little girl can take a beating. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
It was just a figurative saying. What the person meant was there was no frontline, since leona has to stay at the backline peeling for adc, even if she goes full tank.
leona is an initiator though

> [{quoted}](name=Mattboy2000,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HpOyMuEu,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2016-06-08T04:34:37.100+0000)
>
> leona is an initiator though

if there's a target to be picked off, go right ahead. If a team fight breaks out though she can't just initiate and leave adc alone to deal with enemy frontline.
no, leo is actually a straight main initiate in the same vein as malphite or maokai. she goes in first, and her main goal is to drain cd's out of as many enemies as possible.
Well that explains why I always go 7/2/16 as Leona and my adc always dies like 10 times...

Don't worry about it.

Clearly, your ADC was far enough behind that diving the enemy ADC was the clearly better decision.

Just don't think about how it came to that point and you're fine.

You thought Vayne was the carry...

but...
[http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/750/603/df8.jpg](http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/750/603/df8.jpg)
http://media1.giphy.com/media/1FpxFCobvJra/giphy.gif

Tbf supports usually take a while to get tanky and due to their role of either locking down the enemy carry or peeling for their carry they function better as an off tank than a primary one.

Not saying the other people are right,  but their point isn't invalid.

Also damn that game brings back memories.

That's not what off tank means, at least in the moba community.

Off is short for offensive; think Mundo type tanks.

I learned off tank in the sense of primary tank and secondary/off tank.  And leo is kind of an off tank by either description.  She is a pretty ineffective tank if she isn't trying to kill people.

Note that I am not saying she can't peel, just that as far as tanky supports go she is one of the worst at peeling and one of the best at going for kills/lockdown.
That leona frontline is very cute, I think you should come closer :) {{champion:48}}

Tank supports usually don't get tanky until very late game due to lack of gold though. Where as a well played {{champion:57}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:32}} will be walking through the enemy team mid game or even earlier.
One tank isn't going to do it because the enemy ALWAYS has a Lancer.

wut?You mean these lancers?

http://s3.zerochan.net/Fate.stay.night.240.1921324.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=GilgameshSol,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HpOyMuEu,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-06-07T23:09:22.497+0000)
>
> wut?You mean these lancers?
> 
> http://s3.zerochan.net/Fate.stay.night.240.1921324.jpg

Those guys only suicide...
Right in the feels.
And that's why you don't expose your radiator.

Or when you're still in champ select and they are last pick as either jungle or top. Had a guy do this before locking in {{champion:5}}, then continue to complain about the lack of tanks for the entire game.

Don't you know? You're the hard carry. You can't be bothered being the tank, you're the secret Faker who's going to carry these scrubs right out of Bronze every game unless they feed the enemy carries and get too heavy for you.
You can be the tank and still carry, just pick a juggernaut!

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HpOyMuEu,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2016-06-08T04:21:00.454+0000)
>
> You can be the tank and still carry, just pick a juggernaut!

http://66.media.tumblr.com/461bfdf40b1b0ed7332d9c85a73bd626/tumblr_mj0ovqP4Yz1rkroubo1_400.gif

{{champion:106}} 

The answer to getting out of bronze
It may be just me, but before Leona gets tanky, you are indeed playing without a tank.
Gotta love a majority of Riven players

One lone support isn't really that much.

Definitely more than "no" tank, but compared to some giants up in top lane, it's pretty lacking.

When the enemy team's only tank is the support that isn't going to do well in early game because they're laning against me

http://pm1.narvii.com/5968/121ed7cb4cf0bf800fafe388ac752f5e548d6d08_hq.jpg

Tanks have to be assassins that can kill anyone in an extended fight and never ever die
{{champion:105}} {{champion:245}} and Co.
